author: tomwhite
msg: Merge -r 957895:957896 from trunk to branch-0.21. Fixes: MAPREDUCE-1876

author: pgollucci
msg: Fix on fbsd amd64 where U32 is 4 bytes and pthread_t is 8.
xs/APR/OS/APR__OS.h:20: warning: cast from pointer to integer of different size
Consistently cast this to an unsigned long.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-834. csharp: THttpClient resends contents of message after transport errors
This patch causes the send buffer to be refreshed even in the case of errors.
